page.title: 09Martello Towers.
page.content: The Martello Towers were built to defend our shore against Napoleon's threat of invasion.{There used to be {74 Martello Towers,}stretching from Folkestone to Seaford,there are{ 15 of {them still standing in 1985.}The Martello Tower in Rye Harbour is next to the car park and south east from the caravan site. {It has been named Enchantress {Tower and is number 28.The Tower at {Rye Harbour was built on a mound {between 1803_1806.}Its shape is like an upturned flower_pot.On the top of the Martello Tower there were two 6 inch guns. The Royal Military Canal runs close to the Martello Tower in Rye Harbour.20 soldiers would live on the top floor of the tower. { { *+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*
